name: MyRoads
0:
”Alexa, open my roads”
”Alexa, tell my roads to report a pothole”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my roads
Developer Terms of Use
des: My Roads works entirely on voice. There is no need for you to touch a device. The only thing you need to do is ask Alexa to report a pothole. You have to answer a series of questions about the pothole, which is not more than 2 questions. That's all you have to do.
